moreBlocks.lawyersAtMatthewsInjuryLawSelectedForASu: • Matthews, Marc On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
From our law offices in Sarasota, Tampa and Lakeland, Florida, the attorneys at Matthews Injury Law are fully prepared to do what we can to help increase your chances of obtaining the justice you deserve following an accident or some other preventable tragedy caused by someone else's negligence. Regarded as one of our area's premier personal injury law firms, we have achieved remarkable success advocating on behalf of innocent accident victims and their families throughout the greater Sarasota, Tampa and Lakeland regions.

Our law firm's founder and managing partner, attorney Marc Matthews, has earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from his peers for being among the best trial lawyers in the country. Today, he leads a team of some of the brightest and most dedicated minds in the profession, and we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients.

Among some of our most notable successes include an unprecedented $60 million verdict for a traumatic brain injury victim as well as awards of more than $19 million and $16 million for victims of motor vehicle crashes. These are just a few of the multimillion-dollar verdicts and settlements we have secured over the years, and while we cannot make any guarantees regarding your case, we can promise to fight aggressively on your behalf to protect your rights, preserve your entitlements and improve the likelihood for a successful outcome.

To find out more about how we can best serve your needs, you can contact Matthews Injury Law by calling our law office or visiting our website to schedule a free initial consultation. We also offer virtual consultation so that you do not have to further risk your health and safety to speak with us.
